title: Reserve the OnePlus 10 Pro for just $1 ahead of the global launch
content:
OnePlus is gearing up to launch its latest flagship, the OnePlus 10 Pro, in international markets. Yesterday, the company confirmed that it would host the global launch event on March 31. It has now opened reservations for the device, giving interested buyers a chance to reserve the OnePlus 10 Pro for just $1. OnePlus 10

The post Reserve the OnePlus 10 Pro for just $1 ahead of the global launch appeared first on xda-developers.
description: You can now pre-order the OnePlus 10 Pro for just $1. Follow the link in the post to pre-order yours right away!
